alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 7:13PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ROOSEVELT AND SOUTHEASTERN CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM MDT... At 713 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Broadview to 10 miles northwest of Milnesand. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Portales, Texico, Dora, Causey, Milnesand, Ranchvale, Arch, Oasis State Park, and Cannon Air Force Base. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 376 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.
